newsitem.title: USA: Chrysalis sees Q2 similar to those for Q1.
newsitem.headline: Chrysalis sees Q2 similar to those for Q1.

text.p: Chrysalis International Corp said Wednesday after reporting a first quarter loss that it expects "similar results in the second quarter."
The company reported a first quarter loss of $0.06 a share on revenues of $9.9 million, compared to a loss of $0.01 a share on revenues of $9.6 million in the 1996 quarter.
The provider of drug developement services said its capabilities have expanded and its existing infrastructure is capable of supporting a much higher revenue base.

"It is obvious Chrysalis possesses the critical mass and expanded services that our 250 biotechnology and pharmaceutical clients will find advantageous. However, given the long lead times associated with converting proposals into revenues, we anticipate similar results in the second quarter," the company said in a statement accompanying the release of its first quarter results.
